        Description copied from class: ParentController
        Will add the object to the DataBase
        Specified by:
        add in class ParentController
        Parameters:
        arr - always will contain 2 Objects: The first one (get(0)) is the Object to add to the DataBase (Depend on the Controller) The second one (get(1)) is Boolean that indicates if we want to get the new Object's id
        Returns:
        ArrayList that contains the answer: if the Boolean=true, will contain the BigInteger id else, will contain true

        java.lang.Exception

        public Order parse(java.math.BigInteger orderID,
                   java.math.BigInteger customerID,

                   java.lang.String greeting,
                   java.lang.String deliveryType,
                   java.lang.String orderStatus,
                   java.sql.Timestamp date,
                   float price)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IOrder
        parsing the data into new Order object
        Specified by:
        parse in interface IOrder
        Parameters:
        orderID - - the order's ID
        customerID - - the customer who made the order's ID
        deliveryID - - the delivery's details's ID (can be NULL)
        payMethod - - the payment method
        shipmentID - - the shipment ID (can be NULL)
        type - - the type of order by the ENUM
        greeting - - the greeting which can be attached to the order
        deliveryType - - the delivery type by the ENUM
        orderStatus - - the order's status by the ENUm
        date - - the order's date
        price - - the price of the order
        Returns:
        new Order created by the data above
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
